roleset.name: to advance
roleset.note: FURTHER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'further' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from further.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: But unlike Mr. Ruder , who during the 1987 crash [*T*-2] damaged himself by [*-4]saying rather offhandedly that the markets might be closed [*-1] , [Mr. Breeden] -3 is turning the market drop to his own advantage , [*-3]-5 using it [*-5] to further his agenda for the SEC .
